Layout.title: Aimar Bustamante - Frontend Web Developer with 2 Years of Experience
Layout.description: Welcome to my portfolio. I'm Aimar, a frontend developer with 2 years of experience creating innovative and functional web solutions. From Panama üáµüá¶, I specialize in the latest web development technologies. Explore my projects and discover how I can help take your business to the next level.

Hero.subtitle: With 2 years of experience as a frontend developer, passionate about creating innovative and functional solutions. From Panama üáµüá¶, bringing my talent to the world.

AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.1st-paragraph: My name is Aimar, I'm passionate about web development. Since I was young, technology has been my passion. My journey in programming started with Python, but upon discovering HTML, I fully immersed myself in the world of web development.
AboutMe.2nd-paragraph: I consider myself a fervent self-learner. Continuously learning and improving is something that motivates me, and I enjoy sharing what I know with others.
AboutMe.3rd-paragraph: Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work on various projects that have allowed me to grow and acquire new skills. I am committed to continuous improvement and always look for ways to add value to every team I collaborate with.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description-1: Web application where you can keep track of your consumed calories along with the calories burned through physical activity. Additionally, you can view the difference, helping you determine if you are in a caloric deficit or surplus.
Projects.description-2: Web application where you can check the weather for various cities around the world with dynamic information fetched from an API.
Projects.description-3: A web application that includes a menu where you can place an order and add a tip.
Projects.description-4: Web application where you can manage your budget for either the month or the week. You can add your budget, expenses, edit and delete your expenses, and filter expenses by category.
Projects.contact-button: Do you wish to quote my services?
